Package org.taverna.server.master.utils

Miscellaneous utility classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CallTimeLogger
    This class is responsible for timing all invocations of publicly-exposed methods of the webapp.
    CallTimingFilter
    Logs the time it takes to service HTTP calls into Taverna Server.
    CapabilityLister
    Utility for listing the capabilities supported by this Taverna Server installation.
    CertificateChainFetcher
    Obtains the certificate chain for an arbitrary SSL service.
    Contextualizer
    Convert a string (URL, etc) to a version that is contextualized to the web-application.
    DerbyUtils
    Utility class, used to make Derby less broken.
    FilenameUtils
    Utility functions for getting entries from directories.
    FlushThreadLocalCacheInterceptor  
    InvocationCounter
    This class is responsible for counting all invocations of publicly-exposed methods of the webapp.
    JCECheck
    Trivial bean that checks for whether the JCE policy files that allow unlimited strength security are present, and warns in the log if not.
    JDOSupport<T>
    Simple support class that wraps up and provides access to the correct parts of JDO.
    JDOSupport.PersistenceManagerBuilder
    Manages persistence managers in a way that doesn't cause problems when the web application is unloaded.
    JDOSupport.TransactionAspect
    Manages integration of JDO transactions with Spring.
    LoggingDerbyAdapter
    Evil hack to allow logging of the DDL spat out to Derby.
    OneShotThread  
    RestUtils
    Utilities that make it easier to write REST services.
    RuntimeExceptionWrapper
    Aspect used to convert runtime exceptions into a form that can be nicely conveyed to the outside world as HTTP errors.
    UsernamePrincipal
    A simple serializable principal that just records the name.
    WebappAwareDataSource
    Add some awareness of the context so that we can locate databases internally to the webapp.
    WSDLHeadOptionsInterceptor
    Thunk for TAVSERV-293.
    X500Utils
    Support class that factors out some of the messier parts of working with X.500 identities and X.509 certificates.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CallTimeLogger.PerfLogged
    Mark methods that should be counted by the invocation counter.
    InvocationCounter.CallCounted
    Mark methods that should be counted by the invocation counter.
    JDOSupport.WithinSingleTransaction
    Mark a method (of a subclass of JDOSupport) as having a transaction wrapped around it.

Package org.taverna.server.master.utils Description

Miscellaneous utility classes. Includes aspects that might be attached for purposes such as transaction management and invocation tracking.
